name: Moon Lander X
description:
STORY TIME: 

 You are an astronaut in charge of piloting moon lander. Your mission is to safely land your spacecraft in specified locations (Sometimes in crazy in extreme conditions!)

GAME INSTRUCTIONS: 

- Use UP Arrow to turn on the engine and move UP

- Use LEFT and RIGHT arrow to rotate the lander.

- Land on platforms and finish challenges to get max rating.

- Green (Easy) platform will give you 1 point

- Medium (Yellow) platofrm will give you 2 points

- Hard (Red) platform will give you 3 points.

- You will get +1 point for landing with over half-full tank and +1 point for soft landing (velocity below 10)

CREDITS: 

JestemStefan:  Art, Programming, Game Design

Zaraza:  Programming, Level Design

MUSIC - Ben Arntz ben@thebenjamen.com

SFX - ChrisLSound@gmail.com and Craig Alan Carroll

FONTS: [New Hi-Score] Pixel Art Font Rodrigo BSL

MADE IN GODOT FOR THE GODOT WILD JAM #48
